summary: A documentary that examines the question, "If Barack Obama wins a second term, where will we be in 2016?"
cast: Jay Bastian|Joe Biden|Cait Brasel|Gene Burris Jr.|Dinesh D'Souza|Alice Dewey|Lisa Fox|Zackary Steven Graham|Willy Kauai|Paul Kengor|Barack Obama|George Obama|Sarah Obama|Philip Ochieng|Joseph Ojiru|Daniel Pipes|Shelby Steele|Paul Vitz|David Walker
title: 2016: Obama's America
